basicInfo.name: Kafka
basicInfo.description: A member of the Stellaron Hunters, Kafka is a captivating and dangerous woman who enjoys collecting coats. Her past is shrouded in mystery, and she is one of the most wanted individuals in the galaxy.

skills.name: Midnight Tumult
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Kafka's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Caressing Moonlight
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 80% of Kafka's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 30% of Kafka's ATK to adjacent enemies. If the target enemy is currently afflicted with DoT, all currently applied DoTs immediately deal DMG equal to 60% of their original DMG.

skills.name: Twilight Trill
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 120% of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, and immediately triggers all currently applied DoTs to deal DMG equal to 80% of their original DMG. Additionally, applies Shock to all enemies, lasting for 2 turns.

skills.name: Gentle Whisper
skills.description: After an ally uses their Basic Attack on an enemy, Kafka immediately launches a follow-up attack, dealing Lightning DMG equal to 75% of her ATK to that enemy and applying Shock to them, lasting for 2 turns. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.

skills.name: Mercy Is Not Forgiveness
skills.description: Immediately attacks all enemies within a set range. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Kafka's ATK to all enemies and applies Shock to them, lasting for 2 turns.

traces.name: Apathetic
traces.description: Increases DMG dealt by Kafka's follow-up attack by 20%.

traces.name: Torture
traces.description: When using Skill, has a 100% base chance to increase the DoT DMG taken by the target by 15% for 2 turns.

eidolons.name: Da Capo
eidolons.description: When using Skill, if the target enemy is currently afflicted with DoT, immediately triggers all currently applied DoTs to deal DMG equal to 100% of their original DMG.

eidolons.name: Fortississimo
eidolons.description: When using Ultimate, immediately triggers all currently applied DoTs to deal DMG equal to 100% of their original DMG.

buildRecommendation.buildNotes: Kafka excels in DoT (Damage over Time) teams. Prioritize SPD and ATK%. Effect Hit Rate is crucial to ensure DoTs land.

basicInfo.name: Jing Yuan
basicInfo.description: One of the Seven Arbiter-Generals of the Xianzhou Alliance, and the commander of the Cloud Knights. He commands the fearsome Lightning-Lord in battle.

skills.name: Glistening Light
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Lightbringer
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's attack count by 2 for the next turn.

buildRecommendation.buildNotes: Jing Yuan's main damage comes from his Lightning-Lord. Focus on increasing its attack count and maximizing CRIT stats.
